skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.Load
skill.description:
To load a set of 'transportableEntities'.
When several entities should be loaded, the agent acts on each entity by following the order of the elements into the 'transportableEntities' list.
Entities won't be loaded if: - visited entity is not reached (it has moved away or it is localized in a non accessible urban block for instance) - visited entity is already loaded or if it is beeing transported.

parameter.name: transportableEntities
parameter.description: The set of elements to load.

link.name: reach
link.description: To enact the decision to "reach" an element to load.

link.name: load
link.description: To enact the decision to "load" an element.

feedback.name: loaded
feedback.description: Sent each time an entity has been loaded.

argument.name: transportableEntity
argument.description: The "transportable" entity that has been loaded.

feedback.name: notLoaded
feedback.description: Sent each time a "transportableEntity" cannot be loaded.

argument.name: transportableEntity
argument.description: The entity that cannot be loaded.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all "transportableEntities" have been visited. Even if one of them haven't be loaded.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of "transportableEntities" is empty (no element to act on).
